name: Mastodon Material tweaks
description: Various tweaks for the Mastodon Material userstyle. Hiding a few things, adding/changing colors elsewhere. Primarily aimed at using it at a single-column resolution.
additional_info: Master source and changelog available on GitHub. To be applied on top of Mastodon Material, it does not work stand-alone! v1.0.0 - 2017-09-16
